name: Gravity Combat
description:
"Gravity Combat" is a  2.5D online arena shooter in which up to 6 players try to fight each other in zero gravity. The only way to be grounded is the use of the Magnetic Boots. Dodge, shoot and use the boots to outmaneuver your enemies. Be the zero gravity champion!

This game is a student project and will receive updates over time. We are happy to read your feedback and hope that you'll have fun with "Gravity Combat"!
